tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    revision_number INT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE policy_revisions (
    revision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id UUID REFERENCES policies(policy_id),
    revision_number INT NOT NULL,
    revision_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    version INT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT current_timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE policy_revisions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT NOT NULL,
    revision_number INT NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT current_timestamp,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES policy_documents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE document_authors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT NOT NULL,
    author_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT current_timestamp,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES policy_documents(id)
);
CREATE TABLE policy_documents (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE revisions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, document_id INT NOT NULL, revision_num INT NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES policy_documents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE user_permissions (user_id INT, document_id INT, can_view BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, can_edit BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES policy_documents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY (user_id, document_id));

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_content TEXT,
    created_by VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE policy_revisions (
    revision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id UUID,
    revision_number INT,
    revision_content TEXT,
    revised_by VARCHAR(100),
    revised_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES policy_documents(document_id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE roles (
    role_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    role_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE user_roles (
    user_id UUID,
    role_id UUID,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES roles(role_id)
)
